49  public function __construct($dbType, $dbName, $serverName = "127.0.0.1", $port = "3306", $user = "root", $password = "", $options = [], $cache = false) {
50  $this->dbType = $dbType;
51  $this->dbName = $dbName;
52  $this->serverName = $serverName;
53  $this->port = $port;
54  $this->user = $user;
55  $this->password = $password;
56  if (isset ( $options ["quote"] ))
57  SqlUtils::$quote = $options ["quote"];
58  $this->options = $options;
59  if ($cache !== false) {
60  if (\is_callable ( $cache )) {
61  $this->cache = $cache ();
62  } else {
63  if (\class_exists ( $cache )) {
64  $this->cache = new $cache ();
65  } else {
66  throw new CacheException ( $cache . " is not a valid value for database cache" );
67  }
68  }
69  }
70  }
71 
78  public function connect() {
79  try {
80  $this->_connect ();
81  return true;
82  } catch ( \PDOException $e ) {
83  throw new DBException ( $e->getMessage (), $e->getCode (), $e->getPrevious () );
84  }
85  }
86 
87  public function getDSN() {
88  return $this->dbType . ':dbname=' . $this->dbName . ';host=' . $this->serverName . ';charset=UTF8;port=' . $this->port;
